name: LD35 - Don't wake up, Stay Dream!
name_original: LD35 - Don't wake up, Stay Dream!
description:
A combination between STG and Top Down RPG!

The only way to win the game, is stay in dream as long as possible, don't wake up!

Instruction:

- WASD to move
- Stay in the dream as long as possible
- Don't Wake up!!
